text: Ðis synd ða land into Lintune.
Ðe æðelferð geuðe his sunu Leofric.
Þæt þonne lið hidmælum & æcermælum on Wilburhtune.
He hit gesealde ædgare cyninge un besacan.
Eal swa hit his yldron ær mid feo gebohten.
And se fore specena cyning hit gesealde Gode & sancte æðeldriðe his saule to alysednesse.
